name: City of San José Surplus Property Donation Program
description: Surplus property (valued at $1,500 or less) available to eligible nonprofits, including equipment, furnishings, and other items
fullDescription: The City of San José donates surplus property valued at $1,500 or less to eligible nonprofit organizations, helping local groups access needed equipment and supplies.
whatTheyOffer:
- Surplus office furniture
- Equipment and electronics
- Supplies and materials
- Items valued at $1,500 or less
- Availability varies based on city surplus
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit
2. Contact the City of San José surplus property office
3. Submit donation request
4. Browse available items when notified
5. Arrange pickup of approved donations
